channel.title: Posts on Hudson Worden
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hudson Worden

item.title: Automating Building in Public
item.description: As I mentioned in my previous post, I have begun building my personal site to post projects I’m working on. I’ve recently been learning about “Building in Public” and central to it is to maintain constant communication with the public. I thought that it would be great if I could post links to my personal site on Twitter. That way my followers could instantly see any new updates I’ve made.

item.title: My New Site
item.description: Intro Hi everyone, this is my first post on my new site. So welcome! I was able to build this site in less than an hour using Hugo. Hugo Summary For those who may not know, Hugo is a static site generator. You can store your site content in markdown files, and then apply either a custom or open source theme to your site. Hugo will then take the content files, and translate them to equivalent html pages.
